title: Data Solutions Analyst
description:
Data Solutions Analyst

This role acts as a key connector between the Sales, Data Science, and Product teams, ensuring that data related requests are correctly validated, prioritized, and addressed.
You will be the first line of defense for data validation inquiries, joining customer calls, and driving internal clarity around public and proprietary data discrepancies.
